comments:
Build: I20050509-2010

I ended up with a bogus entry in my log because an OutOfMemoryError occur while
writing to the log file.  The bogus entry looks like this:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.core 4 4

(i.e, the date and message are missing).

When I try to double-click on this entry in the PDE error log view, I get an
another error:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument cannot be null
